Solar-Powered Door: Add solar panels to the door to harness energy from the sun, making it an eco-friendly and sustainable option.
Noise-Reducing Door: Incorporate sound-absorbing materials into the door's design to reduce noise levels inside the room.
Automated Door: Install motors and sensors to make the door fully automated, allowing it to open and close automatically.
Personalized Door: Allow users to customize the design and color of the door to suit their personal preferences and enhance their home's aesthetics.
Fire-Resistant Door: Use fire-resistant materials to make the door more durable and safer in case of a fire.
